title: Bring back post game player visibility
body: New patch removed seeing whether a player is in the post game lobby or not, all names are slightly grayed and you can't tell whether they are still there or not. Sometimes when i get matched against really good players, they often give tips about how to be better when i ask politely, but if I try that now I can't tell whether they're still there or not. The removal of this feature has made post game player interaction more difficult.

replies.body: I feel like this is a bug. I have it too and it's very annoying, the post game client in general feels very glitchy atm.

It is a bug, but there were other more impactful issues that needed fixing before season start.

You can still tell when people have left the lobby because the "player has left" message still functions as normal.
